dcterms:creator: V. Vidulin
M. Lustrek
B. Kaluza
R. Piltaver
J. Krivec
dcterms:description: The localization data for the Person Activity dataset captures the recordings of five individuals, who engage in various activities while wearing sensors at different body locations. The task is to classify their activity based on irregularly sampled time-series data.
dcterms:title: Person Activity Dataset

dcterms:creator: A. L. Maas
R. E. Daly
P. T. Pham
D. Huang
A. Y. Ng
C. Potts
dcterms:description: The IMDB movie-review sentiment classification dataset is designed for binary sentiment classification, containing 25,000 movie reviews labeled with positive or negative sentiment.
dcterms:title: IMDB Movie Review Dataset

dcterms:creator: Q. V. Le
N. Jaitly
G. E. Hinton
dcterms:description: The Permuted Sequential MNIST dataset is a variant of the MNIST digits classification dataset, designed to evaluate recurrent neural networks by presenting the pixels of digits in a fixed random permutation.
dcterms:title: Permuted Sequential MNIST

dcterms:creator: M. Lechner
R. Hasani
A. Amini
T.-H. Wang
T. A. Henzinger
D. Rus
dcterms:description: The Lane-Keeping Task dataset consists of human-driving recordings captured under various weather conditions, used to predict the steering action necessary for lane-keeping.
dcterms:title: Lane-Keeping Task Dataset
